title: Vin Diesel may play Black Bold in 'Inhumans'
text:
The "Fast and Furious" actor Vin Diesel is rumoured to play Blackagar Boltagon, a character whose voice can cause massive destructions, in the upcoming Marvel movie "Inhumans".
READ: Vin Diesel answers ''body-shamers'' with six-pack abs
Diesel said that he's up for the role that didn't need his voice. Following Diesel's statement, people were quick to guess that the character would be Black Bold, reports aceshowbiz.com.
"I can totally be something (else) with Marvel," Diesel was Quote: d as saying by io9.
"I think playing that role only makes Marvel that much more excited and me having my experience with Marvel, seeing how great they were, makes me more excited. We've heard a lot of talk about Marvel wanting to have me play a character that doesn't have my voice. So my voice is used for Groot and my presence is used for the other character," he added.
In the comic books, Black Bolt a.k.a. Blackagar Boltagon is the ruler of the Inhumans . He has an ability to unleash great destructive power through the use of his voice. Thus, he chooses to remain silent for most of the time.
Inhumans is scheduled to be released in US on July 19, 2019.
